channel.title: Gordon's Animations
channel.description: When I played the first HL one thing that impressed me a lot was the animations in first person. Even still today not many games are that animated with the arms and recoil. I remember your arms always moving around and just being very detailed with animation, the way the guns recoiled and what not. I was just wondering if you guys are keeping those really detailed animations that HL1 had? If not then I am suggesting it!

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Red’]How about we get on topic, guys? Even I’m lost at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Mangled*:

I don’t recall saying he was wrong. Again, you’re oblivious to what’s going on. Good of you to try and call me out on that though. :retard:

I don’t think you know what oblivious means… Okay let me explain, since I don’t think you understand. First of all oblivious means lacking knowledge or awareness of something. First I said that FAQ is outdated because apparently some people didn’t know that. Then I showed some pictures to prove that it’s the same model. I never said that you said that Robin is wrong. So how am I oblivious?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
Keresh:

And to prove that raw_bean is right have some pictures, Mangled:

I don’t recall saying he was wrong. Again, you’re oblivious to what’s going on. Good of you to try and call me out on that though. :retard:

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
And to prove that raw_bean is right have some pictures, Mangled:

So basically it’s just a re-skin. Same goes for the crowbar.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
^ Exactly. The position of the gun is different as well which makes it look very different, but it certainly seems like the same model. I remember one of the developers saying that they tried making their own but it ended up looking more or less exactly like the original.

I think the whole issue with the FAQ is that it’s simply a guide, not a bible. It’s for newcomers to look and see if their question has been answered before and that’s it. As we’ve seen, the devs are understandably busy enough doing to mod to update something so trivial as the FAQ.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Changed origins and texture, different hand, but looks like the same model to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
raw_bean:

In what way does the Media section contradict the FAQ, which says the HL2 model is being used but with a new texture. The media shot for the .357 and crowbar only list a texture artist, while the other guns list a modeller too.


Read full topic

Mr. Someguy:

The F.A.Q. also says the .357 Revolver is going to use the HL2 models. As you can see in the trailer and media section, it does not.

In what way does the Media section contradict the FAQ, which says the HL2 model is being used but with a new texture. The media shot for the .357 and crowbar only list a texture artist, while the other guns list a modeller too.

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Dillxn
item.description:
Mangled*:

The FAQ says that the crowbar and .357 are HL2 models and animations. The FAQ never lies. If the FAQ lied then we’d all be in very deep shit, especially the ones who like to flame new people for not reading it.

You’re in deep, my friend.
[COLOR=’#212121’]Well, not really because it didn’t “lie,” but you get the picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
I saw that. Those were written two years ago.

Not that I’m right, but the animations in the video, which are probably from the Alpha, look nothing like hL2’s animations.

If they are, they’ve been reorigined to hell and back.

Read full topic

item.title: Gordon's Animations
item.dc:creator: Altamont_Raven
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

If you watch the video, you’ll see they’re clearly not HL2 animations.

Same goes for 357.

BLACK MESA FAQ:

Weapons:

  • crowbar: HL2 model, sounds and animations, but new textures
  • .357 magnum: HL2 model, sounds and animations, but new textures

just, you know, in case you were wondering.

Read full topic

Same goes for 357.

Ramirezoid:

Look at the trailer, the crowbar animations are actually pretty lousy.

It’s probably alpha game-play though, and if it is final, someone in the community will reanimate it so it’s aggressive and violent like in HL1.

They stated before the crash that it was like that because it was a direct hit or something like that.

Although…
